title: Creating a global search
code: vignettes <- docs |> filter(type == "vignette") vignettes |>   select(topic, title, package) |>   arrange(title, package) |>   datatable(escape = FALSE)

title: Creating a global search
code: datasets <- docs |> filter(keyword == "datasets") datasets |>   distinct(topic, title, package) |>   datatable(escape = FALSE)

title: Creating a global search
code: internal <- docs |> filter(keyword == "internal") public <- docs |>   anti_join(vignettes) |>   anti_join(datasets) |>   anti_join(internal) #> Joining with `by = join_by(topic, alias, title, concept, type, keyword, #> package)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(topic, alias, title, concept, type, keyword, #> package)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(topic, alias, title, concept, type, keyword, #> package)`  public |>   distinct(topic, title, package) |>   filter(dverse::is_online(topic)) |>   datatable(escape = FALSE)

title: Creating a global search
text: dverse. Creating (toy) ‘admiralverse’ meta-package (5’ video). Creating website (toy) ‘admiralverse’ global search (7’ video).

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: WARNING: toy example. real packages live pharmaverse.org. goal admiralverse show example create simple yet useful meta-package – centralize installation, use documentation collection admiral packages.
